DzElementData Class Reference
[Basic Types]

DzCustomData implementation that can be associated with an individual DzElement instance. More...

#include <dzcustomdata.h>

Inheritance diagram for DzElementData:

List of all members.

Public Functions

 DzElementData (const QString &name, bool persistent=false)

Public Slots

DzElement * getOwner () const

Detailed Description

DzCustomData implementation that can be associated with an individual DzElement instance.

See also:
DzElement::getDataItem(), DzElement::addDataItem()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzElementData::DzElementData ( const QString &  name,
bool  persistent = false 
)

Default constructor.

Parameters:
name The name for the data item. This must be unique for all data items on a given element - i.e. an element can not have two data items with the same name.
persistent If true, the data item will be saved with the element to the native file format.

Member Function Documentation

DzElement * DzElementData::getOwner (  )  const [inline, slot]
Returns:
The element that this data item is associated with - NULL if it is not associated with any element.
